name: Tilting at Giants
description:
IMPORTANT: Please play on Chrome! Firefox seems to have very poor FPS with webGL technology.

Ride your steed and bring the Giants to their knees! Knock all the Giants (windmills) of the field as fast as you can. The faster you are, the higher your score!

Use 'w', 'a', and 'd', to control yourself. Simply refresh the page to restart

Enjoy!
